qa.name: Whiskers
qa.appearance: Sleek black cat with glowing blue eyes

json_to_edit.voice_over: One paw step for a cat, one giant leap for feline-kind.
json_to_edit.description: Whiskers, the time-traveling cat, materializes in ancient Egypt.
json_to_edit.name: Feline Time Mischief
json_to_edit.scene_summary: A time-traveling cat named Whiskers appears in ancient Egypt and inadvertently changes history.

qa.action: Whiskers materializes in a flash of blue light in the middle of an opulent Egyptian palace.

hf.action: Palace guards and servants react with shock and awe at the sudden appearance of the mysterious cat.

tr.action: Whiskers' futuristic collar blinks and beeps, drawing attention from nearby curious onlookers.

xc.action: The Pharaoh enters the room, drawn by the commotion, and approaches Whiskers with wonder.

ka.action: Whiskers playfully bats at the Pharaoh's ornate headdress, knocking it askew.

fn.action: The Pharaoh's eyes widen in surprise, then soften with amusement and reverence.

af.action: A impromptu ceremony begins as the Pharaoh declares Whiskers a divine messenger.

qo.action: Whiskers is placed on a newly erected pedestal, looking both confused and pleased.

fp.action: Whiskers' collar blinks rapidly, signaling an impending time jump as history is irrevocably changed.

edit_command: Add a new shot after the third shot, showing Whiskers accidentally knocking over a sacred artifact. Make it a Medium-shot with the sfx_keywords of 'crash, gasps' and the action describing Whiskers toppling an ancient vase, causing panic among the onlookers.

label.rationale:
we need to add a new shot after the third shot in the scene. this will involve updating the "shots" section of the json, including the "list_display_order" and adding a new shot entry. we'll need to:

1. determine the position to insert the new shot (after the third shot).
2. generate a new random two-letter key for the new shot.
3. update the "list_display_order" to include the new shot in the correct position.
4. add the new shot details to the "shots" dictionary.
5. increment the "number_of_shots" value.

the new shot will be a medium-shot with the specified sfx_keywords and action, showing whiskers accidentally knocking over a sacred artifact. this addition fits well with the scene's theme of whiskers causing mischief and changing history in ancient egypt.

value.action: Whiskers accidentally topples an ancient vase, causing panic among the onlookers.
